definition: gold/chemical element Au/generic term for lustrous and ductile metals/money/golden/highly respected/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
to melt/to thaw/to blend/to merge/to be in harmony

sentences.english: Eric Warner (Michael Ealy) is the top figure in the financial sector, the future of limitless.
sentences.chinese: 是金融界的頂級人物，前途不可限量。

sentences.english: The City's attention was diverted by the frantic trading in Racal's shares.
sentences.chinese: 萊考股票的瘋狂交易轉移了倫敦金融界的注意力。

sentences.english: Finally, the prospect of profit model JRJ. COM discussed.
sentences.chinese: 最後對金融界網站盈利模式的前景進行了探討。

sentences.english: most of them are corporate bigwigs and financial wheeler-dealers.
sentences.chinese: 大多數爲公司的頭面人物和金融界追逐高利潤的人。

sentences.english: To everyone's surprise, I decided to seek employment in the financial sector.
sentences.chinese: 讓大家感到喫驚的是，我決定在金融界謀職。

sentences.english: Outside of work, I really like following all aspects of the financial world.
sentences.chinese: 工作之餘，我對金融界的一切都非常感興趣。

definition: Sina, Chinese web portal and online media company
Wall Street, New York/by extension, American big business
trader or dealer (of stocks and shares etc)
